input_email_body:
Subject: Resolution for Onboarding Delays

The onboarding process for an employee is being hindered by a lack of adequate training resources. Despite reaching out to IT and reviewing the manuals, and escalating the issue internally, the problem remains unresolved You can reach me at omar.hassan@secure.net.. I require your help to address this and ensure the onboarding is completed smoothly. My name is Liu Wei.
